posts.post_content:
Posted By: Derek
hello i am a collector of all pre war sports and i would really like to have a Turkey Red original! i dont want to pay $200 for them though! I know this may be hard to do, but if anyone has a Turkey Red that isnt in the best shape i would like to buy it! i have always wanted one of these cards( because i really like the concept) commons are fine and abused cards are fine too! Please let me know if anyone can help me locate one of these at a reasonable price! Thanks so much all of you are awesome!- Derek
Feel Free to email me also - hensond62@yahoo.com
